sentence.Network_en: The plan for a citywide cleanup was the mayor's baby.
sentence.Network_cn: 全市性的清扫计划是市长的得意之作.

sentence.Network_en: And they have been awarded citywide and nationwide Gold prizes several times.
sentence.Network_cn: 而且他们屡屡在全国、全市的比赛中获得金奖.

sentence.Network_en: The occasion for the citywide shutdown was an event most expect never to see again.
sentence.Network_cn: 像这样全市性停工的情况是大部分人从没有意料到的.
